title: Ep - 101 - BEN HIGGINS – THE BACHELOR
description:
A high powered entertainment publicist gives her assessment of the Kim Zolciak-Biermann from Real Housewives of Atlanta PR blunder and what she should do moving forward. 


Ben Higgins from The Bachelor talks about his experience on the Bachelorette, the Bachelor, and Bachelor Winter Games, whether men in Bachelor Nation get Brotox, if he will ever find love on television, and about life back in Colorado. 


Content creator Rachel Pitzel reviews Exes on the Beach on MTV.


Podcast host Sonia Sells reviews Bridezillas on WETV. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com

Instagram: @katecaseyca
